title: Software Engineer, Backend
description: Build and scale backend services for Netflix's streaming platform. Focus on reliability and performance.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
5+ years of experience in backend development.
Proficiency in Java, Scala, or Python.
Experience with distributed systems and microservices.

title: Product Designer, Growth
description: Design user experiences that drive subscriber growth and engagement for Netflix products.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Design, HCI, or related field.
5+ years of experience in product design.
Strong portfolio showcasing UX/UI design skills.
Experience with A/B testing and user research.
